name: Blizzkill
description:
Don't let your fire run out!

  • Use A & D to move left and right
  • Jump and Double jump with spacebar
  • Click to shoot fireball

In Blizzkill, you play as a penguin that wasn't invited to the party, but was going to it anyway. Lucky for the penguins at the party, because their fire went out! If you can save the party with your handy torch, you might be invited!
